sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1406433991: "FWD (PCR) [TGL CDC TFM] Update QuestaCDC and intelcdc tool versions"
2. 1405328880: "FWD (PCR) TFM: SBR Power Artist support"
3. 1405328884: "TFM: SBR Fishtail Enabling"
4. 1406441415: "FWD Async_07 error within gpsb"
5. 1406444908: "FWD Latch_08 violation within gpsb"
6. 1406370192: "Change the connection between the "visa port DBGBUS and Output *PUT signals"
7. 1406270159: "FWD (PCR) TGL clock gating enhancement - IOSF SBR - sequential repeater for SBR - use ISM status to explicitly clock gate (or use as enable) for staging of non-control state (payload, eom), to save the dynamic power when ISM idle"
8. 1406269672: "FWD (PCR) Enable router port to switch between fabric and agent dynamically via pin straps"
9. 1406460268: "Add scan mux on fdfx_powergood_rst_b in pgcb"

Backend Updates:

General Updates:

Validation Updates:

General Updates:

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2017WW37" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at SIP HSD

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at Zircon Scores
